## Why this study matters

::: {.deck-grid}
::: {.deck-card}
<p class="deck-card-title">NCD pressure</p>
NCDs now account for a major share of mortality in Kenya while hypertension and diabetes care demand is growing quickly.
:::

::: {.deck-card}
<p class="deck-card-title">Financing bottleneck</p>
Primary care facilities face practical financing constraints that affect medicine availability and care continuity.
:::

::: {.deck-card}
<p class="deck-card-title">Policy relevance</p>
County financing reforms can produce immediate quality gains when linked to facility execution realities.
:::
:::

---

## Study design

::: {.deck-grid}
::: {.deck-card}
<p class="deck-card-title">Design</p>
Convergent parallel mixed methods cross sectional study
:::

::: {.deck-card}
<p class="deck-card-title">Setting</p>
Seme Sub County in Kisumu County  
7 public primary health facilities
:::

::: {.deck-card}
<p class="deck-card-title">Data streams</p>
Structured facility questionnaire  
Financial record review from Jan to Aug 2024  
In depth interviews with facility in charges
:::
:::

## Key findings

1. All facilities produced annual plans, but none had a complete NCD planning and dedicated budget line package.
2. No facility had full direct spending autonomy despite holding bank accounts.
3. County approval timelines often delayed procurement response during stockout periods.
4. Frequent medicine stockouts were reported by 85.7 percent of facilities.

---

## Recommendations for county and facility action

::: {.deck-grid}
::: {.deck-card}
<p class="deck-card-title">Financing rules</p>
Ring fence NCD lines in planning and budget execution at facility and county levels.
:::

::: {.deck-card}
<p class="deck-card-title">Procurement pathway</p>
Create fast emergency procurement workflow for essential NCD medicines and diagnostics.
:::

::: {.deck-card}
<p class="deck-card-title">Accountability loop</p>
Track budget release, approval cycle time, and stockout days in one county facility dashboard.
:::
:::

```{=html}
<script>
(function() {
  var percentData = [
    {label: 'Frequent stockouts', value: 85.7},
    {label: 'No direct autonomy', value: 100.0},
    {label: 'Direct county funding', value: 28.6},
    {label: 'Dedicated NCD budget line', value: 0.0}
  ];

  var countData = [
    {label: 'Frequent stockouts', value: 6, total: 7},
    {label: 'No direct autonomy', value: 7, total: 7},
    {label: 'Direct county funding', value: 2, total: 7},
    {label: 'Dedicated NCD budget line', value: 0, total: 7}
  ];

  function renderChart(mode) {
    var root = document.getElementById('deckConstraintChart');
    if (!root) return;

    var rows = mode === 'count' ? countData : percentData;
    var max = mode === 'count' ? 7 : 100;

    var html = '<div class="deck-bar-list">';
    rows.forEach(function(row) {
      var num = mode === 'count' ? row.value : row.value.toFixed(1);
      var suffix = mode === 'count' ? '/' + row.total : '%';
      var width = (row.value / max) * 100;
      html += ''
        + '<div class="deck-bar-row">'
        +   '<div class="deck-bar-head">'
        +     '<span>' + row.label + '</span>'
        +     '<strong>' + num + suffix + '</strong>'
        +   '</div>'
        +   '<div class="deck-bar-track"><span class="deck-bar-fill" style="width:' + width + '%"></span></div>'
        + '</div>';
    });
    html += '</div>';
    root.innerHTML = html;
  }

  function setMode(mode) {
    var buttons = document.querySelectorAll('.deck-btn');
    buttons.forEach(function(btn) {
      var active = btn.dataset.mode === mode;
      btn.classList.toggle('active', active);
      btn.setAttribute('aria-pressed', active ? 'true' : 'false');
    });
    renderChart(mode);
  }

  var buttons = document.querySelectorAll('.deck-btn');
  buttons.forEach(function(btn) {
    btn.addEventListener('click', function() {
      setMode(btn.dataset.mode || 'percent');
    });
  });

  function updateRisk() {
    var auto = Number((document.getElementById('autoRange') || {}).value || 0);
    var speed = Number((document.getElementById('speedRange') || {}).value || 0);
    var emerg = Number((document.getElementById('emergRange') || {}).value || 0);

    // Heuristic scenario signal anchored to observed baseline 85.7
    var risk = 85.7 - (auto * 0.24) - (speed * 0.19) - (emerg * 0.17);
    risk = Math.max(15, Math.min(95, risk));

    var riskValue = document.getElementById('riskValue');
    var riskFill = document.getElementById('riskFill');
    if (riskValue) riskValue.textContent = risk.toFixed(1);
    if (riskFill) riskFill.style.width = risk + '%';
  }

  ['autoRange', 'speedRange', 'emergRange'].forEach(function(id) {
    var el = document.getElementById(id);
    if (el) el.addEventListener('input', updateRisk);
  });

  setMode('percent');
  updateRisk();
})();
</script>
```
